Â 
Problem description.
Ram has to pay his semester fee.He doesn't have enough money.So he decides to play a game with his rich friend.
They toss a coin and if head comes up ram wins the game,if tail then he loses.
The money he wins/loses increases 100 bucks every time they toss the coin,starting from 100 for first toss.

Input
Input description.

The first line  contains a string of length N

Output
Output description.
For each test case output the Net profit or loss of Ram

Constraints
0 < n <= 100

Example
Input:
HTHH

Output:
600

Example 2
Input:
H

Output:
100
